_comment: 'ask' - Ask user once which method to use, then remember their choice (default)
When set to 'ask', the user will be prompted to choose on first use.
Their choice will be saved to this setting automatically.
handoffMode options (only applies when continuationMethod is 'handoff'):
'clipboard' - Resume prompt is copied to clipboard after clearing context
'auto-paste' - Resume prompt is automatically executed after clearing context
